actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to clarify the duty treatment of certain types of plywood.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to treat plywoods with tongued, grooved, lapped, or otherwise worked edges as plywood for duty treatment purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to clarify the duty treatment of certain types of plywood.
